DOC.brief_summary: The aim randomize control trial test two behavioral intervention among job-seekers risky drinking . The intervention differ theoretical background : Intervention A tailored stage change , Intervention B non-stage-tailored . Over 12 month , job-seekers pro-actively screen risky drinking three job-agencies . Job-seekers risky drinking ask participate study . All three group assess baseline , 3 , 6 15 month later . The baseline assessment self-administered use handheld computer . The follow-up assessment interview phone , primarily . Both intervention group receive individualized computer generate feedback letter baseline 3 month later .
DOC.criteria: Jobseekers risky drinking ( AUDITC ≥ 4/5 [ women/men ] AUDIT < 20 ) Jobseekers already ask participate earlier visit job agency Jobseekers intend talk jobagent/ without wait time Jobseekers physically mentally capable participate study Jobseekers insufficient language/ read skill Jobseekers severe alcohol problem ( AUDIT ≥ 20 ) Jobseekers employ department conduct study
